title: Whirlpool French Door Refrigerator WRF535SMBM Tour
description:
Here we take a look at the Whirlpool French door refrigerator model WRF535SMBM.  For more information on this refrigerator or to purchase check it out at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/product/72577/Whirlpool-Stainless-French-Door-Bottom-Freezer-Refrigerator-WRF535SMBM.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=WRF535SMBM_20170125&utm_medium=video 

Features:
- Configuration and Overview:
Total Volume: 25.2 Cu. Ft.
Freezer Volume: 7.44 Cu. Ft
Refrigerator Volume: 17.75 Cu. Ft.
Refrigerator Type: French Door
Energy and Eco-Friendly
Energy Star® Qualified
Ice Maker: Factory Installed

- Refrigeration:
Spill-Proof Glass Shelves: 1 Fixed Full-Width, 4 Adjustable Full-Width

- Humidity-Controlled Drawers: 2 Half-Width

- Temperature- Controlled Drawers: 1 Full-Width

-Freezer:
Slide-Out Freezer Basket: Upper and Lower Wire
